history.text: OK, I'm reading
I'm here. Take your time.
So, have you seen this movie?
No, what movie are you watching?
The Avengers
I remember the name but I'm not sure. What's it about?
It is a 2012 American Superhero film based upon the Marvel Comics series.  I don't thin it looks too goo.
Good-lol
I think my husband has watched it. It's with Robert Downey, Jr. right?
Right- I think it's a guy thing-lol
Yea. That's probably why I haven't seen it. Maybe I'll give it a try. It's one of the superhero movies.
Rotten tomatoes gave it  a 93%
That's a good rating. I do like Robert Downey Jr's acting ability. I should probably add it to my list.
It's based on a comic
So the good guys win in the end?
I like Downey too, I'm just not crazy about superhero stuff
Of course!
Me either. I'm more into good drama, thriller films.
There is a full cast of all sorts of superheros
Yes, I'm looking it over on my phone. It does sound interesting.
I like dramas and thrillers if I'm not alone-lol
Lol. Understand that. You know sometimes these superhero films will keep you on the edge, too.
Yep, I think my teenage son saw this one with his friends. It's produced by Disney
Disney does put out good films. Lol. My granddaughter and her fav movie, Frozen.
Here is the cast of characters: Iron Man, Captain America, hulk, Thor, Black Widow
I'm old and I love frozen!
Scarlett Johansson and Samuel L. Jackson are in the movie too. All the more reason for me to actually sit down and watch it.
Do you usually watch movies by rating?
No, believe it or not. Some great rated movies are terrible, while some forgotten ones are pretty good.
I agree, so it sounds like you will watch this movie?
Yes, my husband will probably look at me funny when I ask about it, cause he knows my likes very well.

uid1response.feedback: That was a very nice conversation I had with the the other user. Now that I've learned a little more, I'll probably watch Avengers.
